ISLAMABAD,  FRIDAY , MARCH   18,  2022 
 
 
PART I  
 
Acts, Ordinances, President ’s Orders and Regulations  
 
GOVERNMENT OF PAKISTAN  
LAW AND JUSTICE  DIVISION  
 
Islamabad, the 17th March , 2022 
 
  No. F. 2(1)/20 22-Pub.—The following Ordinance Promulgated on 16th 
March , 202 2 by the President is hereby published for general information: — 
 
ORDINANCE NO. V OF 2022  
 
AN 
 
ORDINANCE  
 
further to amend the Railway Laws 
 
 WHEREAS  it is expedient further to amend the Railway Laws, for the 
purposes hereinafter appearing;  
  
 
 AND WHEREAS  the Senate and the National Assembly are not in session 
and the President is satisfied that circumstances exist which render it necessary to 
take immediate action;  
(101)  
 
Price: Rs. 6.00 
 
[7446 (2022)/Ex. Gaz].   
102 THE GAZE TTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., MARCH  18,  2022  [PART I 
 
 
  NOW, THEREFORE , , in exercise of t he powers conferred by clause (1) of 
Article 89 of the Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the President is 
pleased to make and promulgate the fol lowing Ordinance: — 
 
1. Short title and commencement. — (1) This Ordinance shall be called 
the Rai lway Laws (Amendment) Ordinance, 2022.  
 
 (2)  It shall come into force at once.  
 
2. Amendment of Article 3, P.O. No. 33 of 1962. — In the Transfer of 
Railways Order, 1962 (P.O.  No. 33 of 1962), in Article 3, — 
 
(a) in clause (2), in sub -clause (a), for entry (v) , the following sha ll be 
substituted, namely: — 
 
 “(v)  Chief Executive Officer, Pakistan Railway; ”; 
 
(b) after clause (4), the following new cla uses shall be inserted, 
namely:— 
 
“(4A) The Chief Executive Officer shall be appointed by the 
Federal Government  on such terms and conditions as may be 
prescribed.  
 
(4B) The Federal Government may appoint the Chief Executive 
Officer from among the serving or retired officers in BPS -21 or 
BPS-22 of Pakistan Ra ilways Service or from the open market.  
 
(4C) The Chief Ex ecutive Officer shall be responsible for the 
overall functioning and management of Railway operations and in 
the discharge of his functions, he shall be directly responsible to the 
Railway Board. ”; 
 
(c) in clause (6), for the words “General Manager Railway 
Operations”, the words “Chief Executive Officer ” shall be 
substituted; and  
 
(d) for clause (7), the followin g shall be substituted, namely: — 
 
“(7)  The Secretary Railway Board shall assist the Railway Board 
in discharge of its functions. ”. 
 
3.  Amendment of Railw ay Regulatory Authority Ordinance, 2002 
(XCII of 2 002).—  In the Railway Regulatory Authority Ordinance, 2002 (XCII 
of 2002), in section 2, for clause (r), the followin g shall be substituted, namely: —

 “(r) “railway administration ” in the case of railway ad ministered and 
operated by the Federal Government, means the Chief Executive Officer 
of Pakistan Railway and includes other offices of the Federal 
Government pertaining to railways; ”. 
 
 
  
 
DR. ARIF ALVI,  
President .

RAJA NAEEM AKBAR,  
Secretary .
